name: Meteor Impact Craters
description: Circular depressions created by meteor strikes create unique landscapes and potential sources of valuable materials. The impact can create valuable minerals and unique geological features, while the violent history can create supernatural phenomena.
atmosphere: Circular depressions mark ancient cosmic impacts while shocked rock and exotic minerals create unique geological formations. The violent history remains visible in fractured bedrock as rare materials attract scientific interest. Scars from when the heavens fell to earth.
